Articles.Content: Oh my god: out of snacks!
Pressure vessels are way too delicate.
Jeb rode a train to space.
Jeb collided with the space station.
Laythe was way closer than thought....
Why this ship dont wobble much?

Lots of great entries in this thread. My favorites (in order of appearance):

[quote name='People Smarter than me']
And then the rocket exploded. Again. - MOARdV
I didn't go to space today - Commisioner Tadpole
When in doubt, use more struts! TheBadAstronomer
Perfect landing! Now awaiting rescue ship... - 5thHorseman
So far, so good! Wait... nope. - magico13
Why is that planet getting bigger? -Kyrian
Looked at map. Ran into mountain. - Alchemist
Got to Moho. Please, send fuel. - Alchemist
Is that my engine floating away? - Umlux
The delta vee lied to me - silent_protagonist
That engine was supposed to explode. - plainawesome
Jeb designed a rocket. KSC burned. - MaverickSawyer
More speed no no less speed! - trekkie
That isn't supposed to decouple yet. - metalmouth7
Got on a ladder. Things exploded - Pds314
That worked better in my head - Comma_dose
Hey, it's the ground...coming FAST- mythbusters844
I didn't want that stage anyway. Red Iron Crown
For sale: Mission flag, never used. - Kuzzter
Got stuck in VAB designing crafts. - Robotengineer
T Z Spacebar BOOM! RapidUnplannedDissasembly (Only 4 words, but what more is there to say, really?)
"...nothing concerning about this vessel..." Riiight. - 0111narwhalz
Got to Laythe, hatch was blocked.-astropapi1
Well, this could have gone better... - kreutkevic
Need more struts, need more boosters. - TaintedLion
We came, we saw, we scienced. - Mad Rocket Scientist
It was good until it flipped. - Legendary Emu

[/QUOTE]

And my own contributions -


We launched, we flipped, we orbited.
Oh, they're orbiting THAT way. Huh.
Sure, we've got fuel for that.
"Suicide burn" is standard procedure now?!?!?
"I'm sure that wobble will stop."
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RKAZ5NE.png[/IMG]
"That bang means nothing" said Jebediah.
Jeb achieved his first orbit proudly.
Duna. Accident. Lonliness. Hope? Rescue! Home!

I am relaxed. I AM RELAXED!

Docking shaved away all Solar Panels.

Jeb meets Val for a :sticktongue:.
Val gives him a big :kiss:. Edited November 19, 2015 by Jansn
"Malfunction!!" "Jeb, Are you receiving me?..."

Planets entice.
Moons beckon.
Kerbals ascend.

Happy landings!
Rocks fall. Kerbals fly. Who'll die?
What goes up might come down.
At Mach 5, the wing snapped.
Did Jeb bring any toilet paper?
The docking port was on backwards.

What, command chairs aren't mach rated?

[COLOR="silver"][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]

Oh. Looks like it's "Tuesday" again.
and the kerbals are screaming again.

Jeb! Why are you sitting Outside!!!

Wait...shouldn't there be ONE engine???

Bob, Bill...Grab on to Something!!!
DIED while performing atmospheric maneuvering activities.
